post_title: FS: T206 raw & graded, incl HOF & Carolina Brights (REDUCED)
post_content:
Pruning my collection... 
All prices F&F and include tracked shipping via padded envelope.
Please let me know if you want to see better pics... 

Stanage, Carolina Brights, PSA1, $1150
Lattimore, Pied350, PSA 3 (Charles Bray), $150
Wiltse, Pied 350/25, PSA2, $100

Barbeau, Pied350, VG, $65

bump for price redux. 

If that Barbreau were on GMC, it would sell or $125....
I have been out of the game a bit, trying to make my way back and finish the Monster.  Please let me know if you have interest in these.
Updated pics and refreshed the prices!
